We write malicious web site collection last years. 
  I am very interest in what your job.
   
   
  ypchen.
  

wangpingping_cn <jenpwang@...> wrote:
          Hello everyone,

My name is Ping Wang. I am a PhD student majoring Computer Science at
University of Central Florida. I am participating Google Summer of
Code 2008. The project I am working on is "Web Spam Detection for
Heritrix", and my mentor is Gordon Mohr. The abstract of this project
can be found here
http://code.google.com/soc/2008/intarch/appinfo.html?csaid=F6D044FD6B4943FF.
I will establish a public web page for this project where I can put
detailed information and updates on the project. I will let you guys
know when the web page is ready.

This is the first time that I am involved in open source software
development. It would be a great experience. There are so many things
I need to learn. This summer would be busy and fun!

Questions, comments and suggestions are welcome.

Cheers,
-Ping Wang



                           

       
--0-1190338344-1212664393=:6862
